title: Profile photo upload: clarify permanent save messaging

requirements.summary: Update Profile page success messaging to clearly state the display picture is saved permanently to the user profile and will be available next sign-in.
acceptanceCriteria: After a successful upload, the UI displays an English success message that explicitly states the photo is saved permanently (wording may vary but must be unambiguous).
No changes are made to any frontend immutablePaths (e.g., useInternetIdentity/useActor/main.tsx and components/ui).

file_operations.description: Update the post-upload success Alert message copy to explicitly state the display picture is saved permanently to the user's profile and will still be available next time they sign in. Use the existing shadcn-ui Alert component for this message (capability: consistent, accessible success messaging). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
